prompt:
Use case: ui-mockup
Asset type: rehab avatar template keyframe
Primary request: create a cozy-but-clean stylized 3D rehab avatar scene for a website hero frame.
Scene/background: minimalist therapy room with soft warm off-white walls and subtle panel lines.
Subject: woman in early 30s, short curly dark hair, friendly neutral expression, no logos.
Style/medium: modern stylized 3D, polished, non-photoreal.
Composition/framing: centered medium-wide front shot, torso and arms visible, stable framing.
Lighting/mood: soft warm ambient light, gentle vignette, calm cozy tone.
Color palette: cream, muted sage, warm gray, subtle charcoal accents.
Constraints: keep scene uncluttered and premium; suitable as reusable exercise template.
Avoid: photorealism, clutter, dramatic shadows, text overlays.

Use case: ui-mockup
Asset type: rehab avatar template keyframe
Primary request: create a crisp, modern, slightly vibey rehab avatar shot with restrained color.
Scene/background: very clean studio with light gray wall planes and thin architectural line details.
Subject: man in mid 40s with short dark hair and subtle gray temples, calm confident face, no logos.
Style/medium: stylized 3D character, minimal and editorial.
Composition/framing: centered front-facing torso shot with balanced negative space.
Lighting/mood: neutral soft daylight with mild warm key and cool fill, refined.
Color palette: white, light gray, charcoal, forest green shirt, tiny lime accent.
Constraints: modern product-like clarity, strong readability.
Avoid: cartoon exaggeration, busy decor, heavy gradients, text overlays.

Use case: ui-mockup
Asset type: rehab avatar template keyframe

Subject: androgynous adult avatar, short auburn hair, calm expression, no logos.
Style/medium: stylized 3D, elegant and modern.
Composition/framing: centered medium shot, torso visible, straight camera.
Lighting/mood: soft sunset-amber fill with gentle edge light; cozy and welcoming.
Color palette: sand, amber, dusty olive, muted brown-gray.
Constraints: keep it simple and reusable for training videos.
Avoid: photoreal skin pores, dramatic cinematic effects, clutter, text.

Use case: ui-mockup
Asset type: rehab avatar template keyframe
Primary request: create a slightly more vibey modern variant with evening studio atmosphere.
